title: Gulnaaz Polki Choker and Earring Set - A Timeless Splendor
features: This exquisite choker features meticulously set Polki diamonds in a floral motif, showcasing the traditional Kundan setting technique. The antique finish adds a regal touch. The matching earrings are Chandbali-inspired, cascading in layers of Polki stones and delicate pearl drops for a classic South Indian bridal look.
description: Crafted with authentic Polki diamonds and superior 22K gold, this choker and earring set is a valuable heirloom piece. Its traditional design and exceptional craftsmanship make it a treasured addition to any jewelry collection, embodying the rich cultural heritage of South Indian jewelry.
